title: CollateralMarginTypeEnum
description: The enumerated values to specify the type of margin for which a legal agreement is named.

oneOf.title: InitialMargin
oneOf.description: Denotes a margin agreement that is identified for use with Initial Margin/IM.

oneOf.title: VariationMargin
oneOf.description: Denotes a margin agreement that is identified for use with Variation Margin/VM.
